content: I want to move the definitions of docs#Filter.IsBounded etc to Order/Filter/Defs, but this results in compile failures in Bornology files, because docs#Bornology.IsBounded uses the same name in a different namespace. Should we protect one of these defs?
UPD: It doesn't fail inside namespace Filter or namespace Bornology, so I'm going to just explicitly add namespace whenever we open both in another (e.g., root) namespace.
Yury G. Kudryashov has marked this topic as resolved.
